paper.title: KGMM - A Maturity Model for Scholarly Knowledge Graphs based on Intertwined Human-Machine Collaboration

P7077.text: a graded maturity model for scholarly knowledge graphs (KGMM), which specifically focuses on aspects related to the joint, evolutionary curation of knowledge graphs for digital libraries

P1.text: Our model comprises 5 maturity stages with 20 quality measures

P7072.text: We demonstrate the implementation of our model in a large scale scholarly knowledge graph curation effort

P32.text: A shortcoming of these existing assessment models is that they do not take the specific aspects of intertwined human-machine curated knowledge graphs into account

P2.text: For developing and realizing the KGMM we followed a design science approach including the following five-step methodology
